Welcome to UC Riverside Recreation




























Today's Schedule




LIVE COUNTS




HOURS




ACTIVITY/EVENT REGISTRATION


























The UC Riverside Recreation department offers members of the Highlander community a healthy option to living active and meaningful lives while working on achieving their degrees. All UCR students are automatically members of the Student Recreation Center (SRC), a 155,000 square foot state-of-the-art facility for exercise, sports activities, events and general recreational use.


WE'RE HIRING! Are you interested in becoming a member of the Recreation Facilities Governing Board? Apply to our job posting on handshake today!
CLICK HERE TO APPLY TO BECOME AN RGB MEMBER








HEALTH AND WELL-BEING
The health and well-being of the entire UC Riverside community is our top priority. 

We will continue to provide resources and tools to help you maintain your health and well-being.

SEE OUR CALENDAR OF EVENTS
